justification: The data clump identified by key 58 represents a set of parameters (x, y, w, h) that are used to define the position and size of graphical elements in two different methods (`createActivationFig` and `setBoundsImpl`). This clump is chosen due to its frequent occurrence in methods related to UI rendering, which suggests that these parameters are commonly used together to represent a rectangle or bounding box. Refactoring this clump into a single object would simplify method signatures and improve code readability and maintainability.
